entry.dcterms:description: consumption structure of various social strata, relationship between the level and the composition of consumption on the one hand and income, place of residence, and family composition on the other hand; the possession of durables in the family

Appr. 8.000 households from the Unified Population Data Collection System sample. The sample has no proportionate distibution.
Consumption/expenditure diaries and data collection with questionnaire, administered by interviewers
